articles.title: Joint Appeal Issued
articles.content:
Joint Appeal Issued
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a joint appeal on Thursday in connection with the fact that the touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills  kicked off by the U.S. in south Korea.
					The joint appeal calls for expressing firm will to eradicate the root cause of war on the Korean peninsula, safeguard the dignity and the sovereignty of the nation and take the lead in ushering in the new era of peace of the country and its independent reunification, it says:
					
					1. Let us all the compatriots at home and abroad wage a vigorous struggle to oppose the frantic Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises by the U.S. and its vassal forces!
					
					Let us all Koreans turn out as one in the nation-wide anti-U.S. sacred struggle for defending the security and peace of the nation, feeling responsible as the masters of their own destinies and peace!
					
					Let us stage a nation-wide struggle against the attempt to unleash a war by the U.S. introducing THAAD and all other nuclear strategic assets into south Korea!
					
					Let us invigorate the struggle to frustrate the U.S. moves for igniting a nuclear war everywhere fellow countrymen live!
					
					2. Let's wage dynamic nationwide struggle to drive out the U.S. forces out of south Korea!
					
					It is the U.S. invariable ambition to make the Korean peninsula a stronghold for realizing its strategy for putting Northeast Asia under its control. It does not care even though a nuclear war breaks out on this land and tens of thousands of Koreans die. This is the real intension of the U.S.
					
					Let's resolutely reject the U.S. arrogant behavior of attempting to turn three thousand-ri land of Korea into a nuclear war theatre and offer the Koreans as cannon fodder of a nuclear war, and strikingly demonstrate the nation's dignity and spirit!
					
					Let all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad turn out in the struggle to immediately drive the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces out of south Korea and achieve the lasting peace of the country!
					
					Let's wage dynamic nationwide movement to make the U.S. forces pay a price for all the crimes it committed against the Korean nation!
					
					3. Let's resolutely foil the acts of serving the U.S. and the moves for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen by the forces standing against the reunification at home and abroad!
					
					Today the north-south relations have reached the catastrophe and they fail to make even an inch of advance, and the military tension has reached the height on the Korean peninsula. This is attributable to the south side authorities' servile act of following the U.S. vicious policy hostile toward the DPRK.
					
					The south side authorities have to make a serious option at crossroads of pursuance of outsiders, national independence, peace and prosperity.
					
					Let's never tolerate the vicious traitorous act of leaving the destiny of the nation and its interests to the tender mercy of outsiders but thoroughly reject it!
					
					Let's denounce the vicious policy of serving the U.S. and the policy of submitting to outsiders and maintain firm stand of national independence and the stand of giving priority to the nation and attaching importance to it!
					
					Let all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad get firmly united, foil the U.S. and its followers' frantic moves for provoking a nuclear war and usher in the new era of peace and independent reunification of the country!

articles.title: U.S. Top Military Officials' Junkets to S. Korea Branded as War Junkets
articles.content:
U.S. Top Military Officials' Junkets to S. Korea Branded as War Junkets
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Pan-Korean Emergency Measure Committee for Opposing Nuclear War Drills against the DPRK issued a statement Thursday to denounce the U.S. military brass-hats for inciting a war hysteria in south Korea at a time when the situation on the Korean peninsula is getting tense with each passing moment due to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 U.S. Pacific Command chief Harry Harris, Strategic Command head John Hyten and Missile Defense Agency Director Samuel Greaves allegedly in charge of military operations in case of emergency on the Korean peninsula nearly simultaneously flew into south Korea and had confabs for escalating confrontation with the DPRK with puppet Defense Minister Song Yong Mu, Chairman of the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff Jong Kyong Du and other stooges. They also went busy, visiting the drilling grounds for a war against the north and doing the field check-up, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This proves that the U.S. top military officials' south Korean junkets are the ones for war of aggression aimed to finally confirm in field the scenario for a war against the north and put it into practice by instigating the puppet forces.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that after dispatching those top military officials into the south even though it finds itself already on the decline, the U.S. is describing it as a "serious warning message to the north". 
					
					 We view those military brass-hats as no more than tiger moths plunging into the flame.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand with whom it is standing against and stop running as reckless as digging its own grave of destruction.
					
					 We will never remain an on-looker to the present situation inching close to the point of worst explosion due to the U.S. senseless hysteria, but will take stronger countermeasures.
					
					 The war-thirsty tiger moths buoyed by hysteria for a war against the north will never be able to evade the miserable fate of meeting deaths in the flame kindled by themselves.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of students of Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Jo Yong Rae visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday.
					 They laid a bunch of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the bereaved family of DPRK Hero An Tong Su on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Jong Il Sim, widow of An Tong Su, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, Thursday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid at Grave of Ri In Mo
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid at Grave of Ri In Mo
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed at the grave of patriotic martyr Ri In Mo in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri on Thursday on the occasion of the 100th anniversary of his birth.
					 Seen there was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, officials of party and power organs, social organizations and national institutions and unconverted long-term prisoners and the bereaved family members.
					
					 Laid at the grave were wreaths, together with bouquets, in the names of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, social organizations and national institutions.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in the memory of Ri In Mo, genuine revolutionary and incarnation of faith and will, who staunchly fought to the last moments of his life for the country's reunification and accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DR Congo Delegation Here
articles.content:
DR Congo Delegation Here
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Students and Pupils of DR Congo led by National Chairman Mpongo Ne Kongo arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at 29th Summer Universiad
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at 29th Summer Universiad
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK players bagged another 2 gold medals at the 29th Summer Universiad.
					 Rim Un Sim took the first place in the women's weightlifting 63kg with the lifts of 106kg in the snatch and 130kg in the jerk on August 22.
					
					 Kim Kuk Hyang placed first at the women's 10 meter platform diving and Kim Un Hyang placed second in the same event.
					
					 Jong Chun Hui took third in the women's weightlifting 69kg.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Women's Union Officials and Members Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Women's Union Officials and Members Held
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of officials and members of the women's union took place at the Monument to Party Founding plaza Thursday to celebrate the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The dancing party started with song "Glory to General". It was followed by the sea of dancers looking back on the revolutionary career and exploits of the leader who demonstrated the dignity and honor of the country all over the world and sowed the seed of all blessings under socialism on this land with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Songs like "Hullari", "Ongheya" and "We Are Mallima Riders" added to the atmosphere of the dancing party as they reflected the pride and self-esteem of women glorifying their worthwhile life, while enjoying all blessings under socialism brought about by Songun.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., UAWK
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., UAWK
Sariwon, August 24 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) gave its performance at the Jongbang Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province on Thursday to celebrate the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as poem and song "Glory to Our Great Party", dialogic poem "Tell, O Road of Songun" and female solo "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass".
					
					 The performers praised Kim Jong Il for firmly protecting socialism, put the prestige and national power of the great Paektusan nation on the highest level and laid foundations for the eternal prosperity of the nation with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 They also impressively delineated the great pride and honor of holding in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, who is translating the beautiful dream and ideal of the people into reality.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers dealing with the faith and will of the Korean army and people to staunchly struggle for the final victory in the standoff with imperialism and the U.S. and the building of a powerful socialist nation, firmly united around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, officials concerned and agricultural workers in Sariwon City.

articles.title: Art Squad of Youth League Performs
articles.content:
Art Squad of Youth League Performs
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the C.C., the youth league at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday, ahead of the 90th founding anniversary of the Young Communist League of Korea.
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned, officials of the youth league, youths and students.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as female quintet "Our Dear Marshal".
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who trained the youths as successors to revolution, regarding the idea of attaching importance to the youth as the strategic line during the whole course of revolutionary leadership, and built a youth power without an equal in the world.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers representing the leadership trait of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is opening a large flower garden of loving care for the youth on this land.
					
					 Some numbers dealt with the militant spirit of the youths who are determined to give full play to their wisdom and bravery in the general offensive for building a powerful socialist nation, resolutely foiling anti-DPRK sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces, under the uplifted banner of self-reliance.

articles.title: Meeting with Women's Union Members Who Set Example in Assisting Army Held
articles.content:
Meeting with Women's Union Members Who Set Example in Assisting Army Held
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting with members of the women's union who set an example in assisting the army was held at the Women's Hall Thursday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Present there were Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the C.C., the women's union, and officials and members of the union.
					
					 Members of the union who set an example in assisting the army made speeches at the meeting.

articles.title: 8th IT and Cutting-edge Products Exhibition of State Academy of Sciences Held
articles.content:
8th IT and Cutting-edge Products Exhibition of State Academy of Sciences Held
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The 8th IT and cutting-edge products exhibition of the State Academy of Sciences was held at the State Academy of Sciences from Aug. 21 to 24. 
					 It brought together scientists, technicians and teachers of more than 40 units including branches under the State Academy of Sciences, research institutes and universities.
					
					 On display there were more than 130 IT technologies and cutting-edge products made in the scientific researches for putting production processes on an automated, intellectual and unmanned basis and improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 Successes presented by various units including the Mechanical and Paper Engineering Institutes, Math Institute and University of Sciences drew the attention of the participants for high sci-tech standard and great economic and generalization value.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentations in Fields of Metal and Chemical Industries Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentations in Fields of Metal and Chemical Industries Held
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- National sci-tech presentations in the fields of metal and chemical industries were held at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering under the sponsorship of the C.C., the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, graduate students and the three-revolution team members of units under the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Chongjin University of Mining and Metallurgy, Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering, Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 They heard papers conducive to increasing the production of iron and steel, successfully putting the production processes on a modern basis, establishing the carbon one chemical industry and putting the production of chemical goods on a Juche basis.
					
					 There took place lectures on the theoretical basis of technological process of oxygen heat blast furnace and the trend of development of the carbon one chemistry and gasification industry at the sci-tech presentations.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Monday received a letter from the members of a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					 The letter said that he invited officials of the general association to the homeland, always taking deep care of its work, even though he was busy on the road of the Songun revolution day and night for the security of the country and the nation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 During the visit to the homeland, we witnessed the homeland which has become the strongest power of the world despite the desperate sanctions moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers against the DPRK, and the people of the homeland who are full of confidence in the final victory. This helped us further cherish the firm faith and will that the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt Paektu would surely emerge victorious.
					
					 Although the period of the stay in the homeland was short, we keenly felt that the paternal loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un for the general association is boundless and the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea which have reached the sky under the leadership of the Marshal, peerlessly illustrious commander, would be ever-lasting.
					
					 The Marshal's endless compatriotic loving care which gets warm and warm as the time goes by and the invincible might of our homeland which astonishes the world serve as the source of strength and courage that make us lead a proud life as overseas citizens of Juche Korea without fear and loneliness even though we live in an alien country.
					
					 We will wage a more vigorously struggle for the country's prosperity and independent and peaceful reunification, keeping in mind the faith and will that no one on earth can block the advance of the Korean nation led by Kim Jong Un despite difficulties and trials and that the final victory belongs to us.

articles.title: No to U.S. Double-standards Policy: Chairman of United Confederation of Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
No to U.S. Double-standards Policy: Chairman of United Confederation of Koreans in Russia
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Chil Song, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, released an appeal on Aug. 12 in denunciation of the extremely vicious moves of the U.S. to invade the DPRK.
					 He said that Koreans in Russia are simmering with bitter anger at Trump's remarks posing a military threat to the DPRK.
					
					 Bolstering up military capabilities including the nuclear deterrent for self-defense is a legitimate right of the DPRK, he said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. is staging a large-scale military drill together with the south Korean puppet forces every year, describing the DPRK as a "devil".
					
					 The U.S. also openly says that the war exercise is aimed at eradicating the leadership of the country.
					
					 The U.S. is describing small Korea as a "threat' to the interests of the world and the U.S.
					
					 This is aimed at cloaking the sinister ambition to reign over the world or to establish the unipolar world dominated by "the U.S. first".
					
					 He said that he opposes the U.S. ambition for aggression and its military threat to the DPRK, calling on all the peace-loving people to back it and not to allow the double-standards policy of the U.S.

articles.title: Young Koreans in Japan Protest against Anti-DPRK War Exercise
articles.content:
Young Koreans in Japan Protest against Anti-DPRK War Exercise
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The protest group consisting of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the south Korean Youth League in Japan, the Union of Korean Students in Japan, the south Korean Students' Council for National Reunification in Japan and other youth and students organizations in Japan protested against the Ulji Freedom Guardian U.S.-south Korea joint military exercise outside the U.S. embassy in Tokyo on August 22.
					 A letter of protest was read out by the representatives of the Korean Youth League in Japan and the south Korean Youth League in Japan.
					
					 They denounced the war exercise conducted by the Trump administration as the root cause of the military tensions escalating in and around the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They sharply denounced the U.S. imperialists for driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into the uncontrollable phase of a nuclear war, not content with sparking off the Korean nation's wild rage by saying "even though a war breaks out, it would be fought on the Korean peninsula and even though people die, that will be on the peninsula".

articles.title: Koreans in China Blast Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S.
articles.content:
Koreans in China Blast Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S.
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Spokesmen for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and for the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China separately issued statements to condemn the U.S. imperialists for going extremely reckless in the war moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China said in the statement that as for the DPRK's ICBM test-launch, it is the most just measure to safeguard the sovereignty of the country and the peace on the Korean peninsula from the gangster-like moves of the U.S. to invade and stifle the DPRK brandishing various strategic weapons including nukes.
					
					 All the Korean nationals under the association assail the moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK, the statement said, declaring that if the U.S. dares to commit the slightest provocation against the DPRK despite its warning, we will turn out together with the fellow countrymen in the homeland in the sacred war to wipe out the enemy in order to safeguard the sovereignty.
					
					 The spokesman for the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China in a statement noted that UN "sanctions resolution" 2371 constitutes a blatant violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK and an undisguised challenge to it as a product of the extremely vicious moves of the U.S. to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean residents in China will also turn out as one in the just struggle in hearty response to the vigorous struggle of the army and people in the homeland for frustrating the gangster-like moves of the U.S. imperialists to trample down upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and its rights to existence and development.

articles.title: Great Songun Brilliant Commander and Chol Pass
articles.content:
Great Songun Brilliant Commander and Chol Pass
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Chol Pass, bounded by Kosan County and Hoeyang County of Kangwon Province, the DPRK, is cherished among the Korean people as the symbol of the Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership.
					 The pass makes the service personnel and people of the DPRK recall the undying feats of leader Kim Jong Il who made a ceaseless inspection of military units for Songun to defend the destiny of the country all his life.
					
					 The pass, 677 meters above the sea level, is steep. In the days of his Songun revolutionary leadership, Kim Jong Il went over the pass on 18 occasions to inspect frontline posts on Height 1211, Mts Jihye and Oun , Jikdong Pass and Height 351 regardless of bad weather.
					
					 One day of March Juche 85 (1996), he personally drove the car on the pass. Looking round the monument to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung on the pass, he said that Chol Pass is a significant place where Kim Il Sung left his footmarks and showed loving care for the servicepersons.
					
					 When soldiers of a frontline unit earnestly asked him not to pass Chol Pass, he said that he cannot receive a diploma of Chol Pass till the day of final victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. against Acting Rashly
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. against Acting Rashly
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The inspection of the Command of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Aug. 14 was the demonstration of his unbreakable will not to pardon those who are going to provoke the DPRK and make a mockery of the destiny of the nation, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Thursday.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Now that the DPRK is capable of decisively smashing the nuclear threats and blackmail by the enemies, defending the sovereignty and right to existence and guaranteeing the future of the nation forever, it is the time for the DPRK to fight a final battle with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into a touch-and-go one, going reckless. It is as foolish an act as pulling a noose around their necks.
					
					 It is unthinkable for us to remain a passive onlooker to the provocative actions of the enemies today when we are capable of fighting any war liked by the gangster-like U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The self-defensive nuclear deterrent of the DPRK is neither a thing which should be recognized by anyone nor a bargaining chip to be bartered for anything.
					
					 It is a real military means to react decisively to the moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK and the military threats and blackmail from the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. starts a war on the DPRK, miscalculating the patience of the DPRK, the former would meet the miserable fate which is hardly comparable with the big defeat that it suffered in face of the army and people of the DPRK in the Korean War in the 1950s which was a confrontation between a rifle and an A-bomb.
					
					 This is not hot air.
					
					 It is necessary for the U.S. to think reasonably and judge properly not to suffer shame in the eyes of the world again.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams UNSC as Puppet Organization
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams UNSC as Puppet Organization
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The UN "sanctions resolution" which was fabricated while pulling up the DPRK's test-fire of ICBM as a "threat to global peace and security" is the product of the U.S. heinous moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK from A to Z. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 The UN Security Council originally came into the existence for global peace and security, not as a means for high-handed and arbitrary practices of nuclear powers.
					
					 Those countries which conduct most of the nuclear tests in the world and launch ICBM regardless of time while seeking the undisguised ambition to maintain the nuclear hegemony forever cooked up the "resolutions" which brought charges against the DPRK's steps to bolster up nuclear force for self-defense, and slapped sanctions under the pretext of "violation". This is an expression of the brigandish double-standards.
					
					 The world's nuclear powers include a country which realized its dream of nuclear weapons states despite sanctions and pressure, while asserting that "they would have access to nukes even by selling trousers" and a country which is still exposed to the U.S. persistent sanctions. Yet, they joined in the U.S. sanctions racket while groundlessly pulling up the DPRK's nukes and test-fire of ICBM without dignity, oblivious of their situations in the past and today.
					
					 This implies that the UNSC has turned into a bargaining ground of big powers for seeking their interests including the U.S. and into a political apparatus of the White House working for its hostile policy toward the DPRK.  
					
					 The universally recognized principles of international relations have openly been ignored owing to the tyrannical moves of the U.S.-led imperialist forces, and justice has been interpreted as injustice in the interests of nuclear powers. 
					
					 This present situation proves once again that only when one has strong power, one can have a say on the international arena and will be able to frustrate the nuclear powers' extreme selfish and hegemonic ambition, and protect oneself and defend justice and principle of the international relations.

articles.title: Fraud of Park Geun Hye Group Disclosed
articles.content:
Fraud of Park Geun Hye Group Disclosed
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- There disclosed a fact that the Park Geun Hye group of traitors made a mockery of the people with a false historic relic during her office.
					 According to the south Korean CBS on Aug. 18, the stamp of King Tokjong during the Feudal Joson Dynasty, which the south Korean cultural office said was taken back from the U.S. some years before, is a phony fabricated by pro-Japanese elements during the Japanese imperialist colonial rule.
					
					 According the survey, this stamp was made in 1924 at the instruction of the second son of Li Wan Yong, one of "five traitors in 1905" and the real one was confirmed to be lost in the same year.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Protest against War Drill near U.S. Embassy
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Protest against War Drill near U.S. Embassy
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters for People's All-out Action and the People's Action for Peace against War of south Korea launched a struggle against the war drill of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers near the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Aug. 21 and 22, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The participants marched from the Seoul Sejong Cultural Center to close to the U.S. embassy, holding the banners bearing the words reading "Halt War Drill", "Trump, Stop War Agitation", etc.
					
					 At the end of the demo the participants held a meeting.
					
					 The speakers said UFG is a rehearsal for rounding off preemptive attack and "beheading operation" scenarios.
					
					 The government should not read the U.S. face but pay heed to the people's voices.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth Bodies Call for Halting War Drill at Once
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth Bodies Call for Halting War Drill at Once
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- South Korean youth and students organizations launched an action near the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Aug. 21 to protest against Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and six other youth and students organizations held a news conference.
					
					 The speakers said that the kick-off of the military rehearsal in which OPLAN 5015 calling for "beheading operation" and preemptive attack for eradicating the leadership of the north is applied is little short of adding fuel to the fire.
					
					 The press release read out at the press conference declared neither sanctions nor pressure can achieve peace on the Korean peninsula. It noted the military rehearsal for war should be halted at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Hold Rally before U.S. Embassy
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Hold Rally before U.S. Embassy
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- South Korean social organizations and political party held a rally in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Aug. 21 in denunciation of the ongoing Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill, according to the south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 They were the Central Council for National Independence and the Peaceful Reunification, the Headquarters for the Peace Treaty and the People's Democratic Party.
					
					 The speakers said that Ulji Freedom Guardian kicked off at last, adding that it is universally known that it is the U.S. that escalates the danger of war on the Korean peninsula every year.
					
					 They said that the military exercise must be discontinued at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Who Are Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun" on its website on August 16 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and the Youth Day.
					 Kim Jong Un's letter on September 18, Juche 103 (2014) says that the Korean youth have covered the glorious path while performing heroic feats and winning proud victory through many years of the revolution under the wise leadership and benevolent loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks for the Korean youth to successfully fulfill the role as young vanguard of the Party in the present historic advance and ways for doing so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Korea's Reunification Praised in Britain and Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Korea's Reunification Praised in Britain and Switzerland
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- British and Swiss organizations made public joint statements on August 3 and 6 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula said t that the immortal work of Kim Jong Il is the classical work that provided the basic principle for accomplishing the cause of national reunification just as intended by President Kim Il Sung, and went on:
					
					 The classical work of Kim Jong Il has proved great vitality in developing the country's reunification movement into the nationwide movement during the last 20 years as an encyclopedia that gives clear answers to all the problems arising in realizing Korea's reunification.
					
					 The Korean people's struggle for the country's independent reunification under the banner of the Juche idea will surely be victorious.
					
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il for formulating the Three Principles of National Reunification, the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo which were advanced by Kim Il Sung as the Three Charters for National Reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Government's Statement Supported by Organizations of Ethiopia, Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Government's Statement Supported by Organizations of Ethiopia, Russia
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Ethiopian and Russian organizations expressed full support to the DPRK government's statement.
					 The Ethiopian Taekwon-Do Federation released the following statement on August 9:
					
					 We support the principled stand of the DPRK government.
					
					 The DPRK's access to the strongest nuclear force is to defend the sovereignty of the country and the vital right of the nation from the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. that have pursued its hostile policy toward the DPRK and threatened it with nukes over more than half a century.
					
					 It is a just measure for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly see the strategic position and retaliation will of the DPRK and stop its reckless attempt at stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a statement on August 8 that the U.S. cooked up the "sanctions resolution" 2371 against the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN Security Council.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The imperialists persist in frantic sanctions and blockade against the DPRK, regarding it prospering day by day as a thorn in the flesh, but they will not invade even an inch of the DPRK's land.
					
					 The fabrication of the new "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK is an insult to the whole mankind.
					
					 On the same day, the Dagestan Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy of Russia in a statement fully supported the unshakable will of the Korean people to make the U.S. pay for its heinous crimes a thousand-fold.

articles.title: Portavoz de entidad coreana critica viaje de comandantes yanquis al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de entidad coreana critica viaje de comandantes yanquis al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Cuando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se torna cada vez mas delicada debido a los ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian, los cabecillas de la capa militar de Estados Unidos viajan al Sur de Corea para levantar la oleada de guerra.
					Con respecto a ello, el portavoz del Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes (CPME) contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte publico el dia 24 la siguiente declaracion:
					
					El comandante de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico Harry Harris, encargado de las operaciones militares en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana, el comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas, John Hyten, y el director de Defensa Antimisiles, Samuel Greaves, arribaron casi simultaneamente al Sur de Corea y se reunen seguidamente con el ministro de Defensa Nacional, Song Yong Mu, el presidente de la junta de jefes de Estado Mayor, Jong Kyong Du, y otros lacayos surcoreanos para debatir el enfrentamiento anti-RPDC. Para colmo, recorren los campos de entrenamiento de guerra anti-RPDC bajo el rotulo de revisar en el terreno la disposicion de combate.
					
					Esto demuestra que la visita al Sur de Corea de los caudillos militares norteamericanos tiene el objetivo de confirmar finalmente en el terreno el guion de guerra nuclear anti-Norte y ponerlo en practica instigando a los titeres surcoreanos.  
					
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que pese a su miserable situacion en declive, EE.UU. envio con urgencia al Sur de Corea a los cabecillas de la capa militar y anuncia que esto "sera un mensaje de advertencia severa al Norte de Corea".
					
					A nuestra vista, esos caudillos no son mas que las polillas que se meten en el fuego.
					
					EE.UU. debe conocer bien quien es su rival y dejar de cometer la tonteria de caerse en la trampa propia.
					
					Nunca estaremos con brazos cruzados ante la situacion actual, que se dirige al limite de explosion debido a la irremediable furia belica de EE.UU., y le responderemos con las medidas mas intransigentes.
					
					Los maniacos de guerra deseosos de agredir al Norte seran condenados a la autodestruccion tragica.

articles.title: Llamamiento conjunto de las direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de APRP
articles.content:
Llamamiento conjunto de las direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de APRP
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos inicio por fin en el Sur de Corea los ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian llevando a punto de explosion la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, las Direcciones Nortena, Surena y Ultramarina de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) publicaron el dia 24 un llamamiento conjunto.
					Expresando la firme voluntad de eliminar la causa de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion y abrir en la delantera la nueva epoca de la paz y la reunificacion independiente del pais, el documento exhorto a todos los coreanos como sigue:
					
					1. !Todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais, dinamicen la lucha por rechazar los demenciales ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian de EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites!
					
					!Que todos los integrantes de nuestra nacion se levanten unanimemente en la sagrada y pannacional guerra antiyanqui por defender la seguridad de la nacion y la paz asumiendo la responsabilidad de encargados directos de su destino y la paz!
					
					!Desarrollen la lucha pannacional contra el intento de desatar la guerra de EE.UU. que introduce indiscriminadamente el THAAD y las propiedades estrategicas nucleares de todo tipo en el suelo surcoreano!
					
					!Intensifiquemos en todos los lugares donde vivan los coreanos la lucha por frustrar las tentativas de EE.UU. de provocar la guerra nuclear! 
					
					2. !Dinamicemos la lucha pannacional por expulsar del territorio surcoreano a las tropas norteamericanas!
					
					EE.UU. tiene la invariable ambicion de convertir la Peninsula Coreana en el punto de sosten para el cumplimiento de su estrategia de tomar la hegemonia en el Nordeste Asiatico y piensa que para ese fin, no es un problema el estallido de guerra nuclear en el territorio coreano ni importa la muerte de miles de coreanos.
					
					!Rechacemos tajantemente la conducta arrogante de EE.UU., que trata de convertir el territorio patrio en el campo de guerra nuclear y utilizar a los coreanos como carne de canon de la guerra nuclear, y pongamos de pleno manifiesto la dignidad y el temperamento de la nacion coreana!
					
					!Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, levantense unanimemente en la lucha por expulsar sin demoras del suelo surcoreano a las tropas agresoras yanquis y lograr la paz duradera del pais!
					
					!Despleguemos con energia el movimiento pannacional para pasar la cuenta final de todos los crimenes cometidos por las tropas norteamericanas en contra de nuestra nacion!
					
					3. !Llevemos al fracaso los actos proyanquis y de enfrentamiento fratricida de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas!
					
					Hoy en dia, las relaciones N-S empantanadas en la peor coyuntura de ruptura no se mejoran ni un apice y por el contrario, llega al climax en la Peninsula Coreana la tension militar, lo cual se debe a la conducta sumisa de las autoridades surcoreanas que se suman a la brutal politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deberan tomar la seria opcion en esta disyuntiva: la sumision a las fuerzas extranjeras o la independencia y la paz y prosperidad de la nacion.
					
					!Rechacemos tajantemente los actos vendepatrias que persiguen confiar en las fuerzas extranjeras el destino de los compatriotas y los intereses de la nacion!
					
					!Mantengamos firmemente la posicion de independencia nacional y de dar prioridad e importancia a nuestra nacion condenando los infames actos serviles a EE.UU. y la politica sumisa a las fuerzas extranjeras!
					
					!Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar abran con las fuerzas unidas la nueva epoca de paz y reunificacion independiente del pais frustrando la febril campana de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y sus seguidores!

articles.title: Depositadas ofrendas florales ante tumba de martir patriotico Ri In Mo
articles.content:
Depositadas ofrendas florales ante tumba de martir patriotico Ri In Mo
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del centenario del cumpleanos del martir patriotico Ri In Mo, fueron depositadas el dia 24 las ofrendas florales ante su tumba situada en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna de Sinmi.
					Ante la tumba saltaba a la vista la ofrenda floral enviada por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En la ceremonia de homenaje tomaron parte el vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Yong Chol, los funcionarios de los organos del partido y el poder, entidades de masas e instituciones centrales, los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados y los familiares del difunto.
					
					Se depositaron las ofrendas florales a nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, entidades de masas y organismos centrales y los ramos de flores.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de Ri In Mo, verdadero soldado revolucionario y poseedor de la conviccion y voluntad quien fue muy fiel a la idea y la orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y lucho hasta el ultimo momento de su vida por la reunificacion de la patria y el triunfo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica la falta de imparcialidad del Consejo de Seguridad
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica la falta de imparcialidad del Consejo de Seguridad
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- La "resolucion de sancion" inventada en la ONU cuestionando el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental de la RPDC como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" constituye de punta a cabo un producto de la brutal campana de aislamiento y atropello de EE.UU.
					Adelanta asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido hoy, y prosigue:
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU nacio para la paz y la seguridad del mundo y no es un medio de despotismo y arbitrariedades de las potencias nucleares.
					
					Estos paises persiguen abiertamente la ambicion de mantener para siempre la hegemonia nuclear realizando el mayor numero de pruebas nucleares y lanzando a menudo los ICBM.
					
					Es el climax de la pauta de doble rasero que tales paises hayan "fabricado" las "resoluciones", que incriminan las medidas de la RPDC para el incremento de sus fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa, y le impusieran la sancion pretextando la "violacion" de esos documentos.
					
					Entre las potencias nucleares de hoy hay un pais que logro la posesion del artefacto nuclear a riesgo de la sancion y presion insistiendo en que "hay que vender hasta los pantalones si se necesita para poseer las armas nucleares" y otro que esta sometido a la sancion persistente de EE.UU.
					
					Sin pensar en ello, hasta esos paises se sumaron a la campana de sancion de EE.UU. criticando absurdamente el arma nuclear y el ensayo de ICBM de la RPDC.
					
					Este hecho deja conocer que el Consejo de Seguridad se ha convertido en un espacio de regateo de los intereses de EE.UU. y otras potencias y en un aparato politico de la Casa Blanca para la implementacion de la politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Debido al proceder despotico de las fuerzas imperialistas acaudilladas por EE.UU., se desprecian abiertamente los principios de relaciones internacionales reconocidos mundialmente y se invierte lo justo en lo injusto segun los intereses de las potencias nucleares.
					
					La realidad de ahora comprueba una vez mas el hecho de que solo cuando un pais sea fuerte, podra exponer dignamente su posicion en la escena internacional, defenderse frustrando el extremado egoismo y la ambicion dominacionista de las potencias nucleares y preservar la justicia y los principios de relaciones internacionales.
